title: Childish Handwritten Monoline (sewsew woodmark by Because Studio
content:
Probably custom... But... Any suggestion for similar (childish handwritten monoline) would be greatly appreciated. Thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131711im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sewsew_4461.png)
author: Ryuk

comments.content:
I think you're right about custom. As an alternative, how about [Girl Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131711/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/scholtz/girl-script/) by Merle Scholtz.

- Mike Yanega
Thank you Mike for this suggestion. Hope others will come.
